489490.name: Quadrilateral Cowboy Art Book
489490.description:
This interactive art book is a peek into the art development of Quadrilateral Cowboy.

  • Examine props in the interactive model viewer.
  • Browse concept art, notes, and sketches.
  • Take an audio tour in the interactive sound viewer.
  • Read developer commentary for various art assets.

Also includes PDFs for Quadrilateral Cowboy box art, poster, and papercraft characters.
489490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
